text:
I have noticed an increase in bystander participation! 🔥🔥💪🏼🦄🔥🔥 Not just in the workplace, but in public places too! 😊

I was recently followed onto a bus, harassed, and assaulted by a creepy guy, and a small woman on the bus pointed to the sign that was posted that said “REPORT IT to STOP IT!” She said “You are NOT allowed to harass her! I will REPORT you! STOP IT NOW!” He still followed me off the bus, and into the hospital where he assaulted me again, but at that point, I got LOUD, and the receptionists all stood up, and helped me run the guy out of there! 
I filed a police report, but they have not found the man who assaulted me yet, but all of the women who stood up for me that day, including myself are my HEROES! 🔥🔥💪🏼🦄🔥🔥
